SELECT trainJurisdiction.jur_name AS authorityName, trainJurisdiction.identification AS authorityKey FROM train_jurisdiction AS trainJurisdiction INNER JOIN train_role_jurisdiction AS trainRoleJurisdiction ON trainRoleJurisdiction.jurisdiction_id = trainJurisdiction.id INNER JOIN train_role AS trainRole ON trainRole.id = trainRoleJurisdiction.role_id INNER JOIN train_user_subsidiary AS trainUserSubsidiary ON trainUserSubsidiary.role_id = trainRole.id INNER JOIN train_user AS trainUser ON trainUser.id = trainUserSubsidiary.user_id
AND trainUser.id = #{userId} AND trainUser.is_deleted =2
